name: E N I G M A T I K
name_original: E N I G M A T I K
description:
- A submission for Unexpected Jam 2020 -
Solo-project made in a span of two weeks.

The game is a short horror adventure with a few mini-game segments.

Controlled entirely by mouse/touchpad.

Features hand-drawn and photo-based graphics.

Original art and music by the developer.

The game is playable on the browser and as a Windows - .EXEcutable.

Also tested to run flawlessly on Linux using WINE.
